alert.note: Alert for Itawamba (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 09 at 6:43PM CST until December 09 at 7:45PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Itawamba County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 745 PM CST. * At 643 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fulton, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fulton, Mantachie, Tremont, Fairview, Clay, Abney, Eastman, Cardsville, Tilden, Bounds Crossroads, Dorsey, and Jacinto. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for northeastern Mississippi.
